Representation

The information about the selected words is stored in the property selections which is an array of TextSelection objects where each item has the following properties: 

{
    "index": number | string, // index of the item.
    "content": string, // the selected content.
    "css": string, // optional css classes of the component separated by a space.
}

Space and newline characters are stripped from the start and the end of the content property of TextSelection objects.

Typographies

The component comes with the following level of typography:

  • display4
  • display3
  • display2
  • display1
  • headline
  • title
  • subheading2
  • subheading1
  • body1
  • body2
  • caption
